website_summaries.verdict: A reversible option that offers two colors for the price of one. Includes two shams and a geometrical stitch for a modern style.
pros: Not too thick and surprisingly warm
cons: Washing can cause clumping of the material

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for a comforter
customer_reviews.text: I decided to wash this when I got it to be on the safe side. I followed the wash instructions as listed on the tag. However, when I took it out the wash, I seen that pieces of the material on the inside began to come out. It's a shame that happened after ONE wash. Also, the zipper/material for the pillow sham ripped when I put a pillow inside.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good LIGHT comforter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter. We usually get very warm when we sleep and this comforter is lightweight and not huge and clunky like most of them. This is good if you want a LIGHT comforter, not a heavy one that traps heat. It's very soft and light which makes it easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Cluczak

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly the color as the picture! it's not too heavy and not too light! it has some stray rings but it's great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie

customer_reviews.title: The price may be lower than other comforters but the quality is not.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged to ensure no damage was done in shipping. Came tied together with a pretty ribbon. The material is soft and comfortable on the skin. The comforter is warm but not too warm so I don’t wake up after kicked the comforter off of me like I have with other comforters I’ve owned. The colors are beautiful. I definitely will buy this comforter in different colors for variety in my options in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, light and soft, but not that durable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright navy and gray comforter. I washed per instructions as soon as I received it. After one wash, this comforter was pilling like crazy. I wish it was more durable because it truly is a nice light comforter.
customer_reviews.author: BookishLor

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money
customer_reviews.text: I washed it once... As directed... The filling came out all over and balled up all over the blue side of the comforter. Emailed customer service. No response. Do not buy this. I will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Cheley

customer_reviews.title: SKIP THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ridiculously thin thin thin. Like other reviewers, I'm totally afraid to wash this, even on gentle cycle cause I fear it'll come apart. This absolutely should NOT be called a comforter, this is a super thin flimsy blanket, the pillow sham is even worse. I will say, my Daughter loves the colors, so now I'm stuck with keeping this & looking to buy a better one elsewhere. Feels like I just threw money away. Super disappointed, I should have checked the reviews first.
customer_reviews.author: Cheree

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: So glad i found this comforter. I searched in store and online and couldn’t find a plain comforter that I actually liked. I was looking for a plain gray comforter and found this on amazon and decided to do an amazon bedding project. All bedding was purchased through amazon. I love the color combination of this comforter. The color is actually more of orange sherbet or creamsicle rather than coral. I like that it isn’t too thick because I am hot bodied.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hill

customer_reviews.title: Product was great quality d I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product was great quality d I would recommend, however I will be sending back:( The color is more of a turquoise than an aqua. Blue are hard to match of course and what I needed was a more of an aqua mint shade. I highly recommend it if this is the color choice you need. A closer picture of the product may have helped in my decision to purchase. I would have given a 5 star if the return had not cost me $11. Again, the product is well worth the money, it just doesn't match our room and even in my picture it is hard to tell the difference, but to the naked eye it is quite different.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Taron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you think
customer_reviews.text: Its fluffy and light and perfect- I have a wonderful collection of fuzzy blankets, but the quilts I used to use during winter have all been reclaimed by another family member. This left me in a bind, because it meant I had to find something now that the cold months are around again. This fit the bill, and the reviews were great so I went ahead and got it. 10/10 best purchase I've made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nosy SonSo

customer_reviews.title: Not the color that is pictured. It's a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the color that is pictured. It's a lot darker. For my granddaughter’s room and she likes it so I’m going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Church

customer_reviews.title: Attn The Teal Is Much Darker Than it Appears
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the teal color and it is not even remotely what is pictured. It's waaaaaaay darker. And from what I'm seeing, a completely different color. When I searched turquoise comforters, I don't know why in the world this pulled up. I'm doing my niece's room in pink and turquoise and this just isn't going to work with the other blues. It has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Not A Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Colors do not match the photos. Our Navy blue and Dark grey are more royal blue and light grey. Very comfortable. However the quilting threads come lose very quickly. After one wash the threads are releasing from the poly fill.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Good comforter ...Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: The length is long enough where I don’t have to buy a skirt. It is not heavy but good for all year with a blanket in the winter. A few wrinkles but confident they will fall out. Pillow shams are rather thin but does have zippers. Accurate color and for the price can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: LKC

customer_reviews.title: Soft and luxurious comforter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a guest comforter for my rolling bed, but I decided I need to order a bigger size for my bed. This is the softest comforter I have felt in a long time. Not only is it soft, but is also breathable. I wanted to try it out before giving it to any guests, so I have been using at nap time with my baby and I love it! It feels so warm and comfortable to sleep under. I don't know what is going to happen when I have to give this up to guests.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Puts the comfort in comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest comforter I have ever bought. I don't really care that it's reversible because that's not my jam but it is so pretty. The color is exactly the same as the picture. Literally exactly the same. The material is polyester but it feels much softer then you would expect. It's very very soft. My one complaint is that it comes in a vacuum sealed bag so when you try to put it back in the plastic bag thing it's very difficult and I ended up rolling it sleeping bag style to jam it in there. But that's not an issue if you're not going to put it back in the bag. Buy this comforter, buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: Workout Dutchess

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these in the twin size for each of my kids. When they arrived i was really surprised how well these were packaged. They came inside a plastic zipper bag, and were in another vacuumed sealed bag within that. When i unpacked them they expanded and fluffed up nicely. My kids told me they are helping to keep them warm on the cool nights. Currently they use sheets, fleece blanket and now these comforters. Previous to getting the comforter they did say they were cold some nights. Since getting these I haven't heard them mention they were cold at all. Nice product, am thinking of replacing my older comforter with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected - then gave another review.
customer_reviews.text: Update 11/20/19 After keeping this comforter and using it, it’s actually really nice, just a little think. It’s not as heavy as my other down comforter. I will say I really do like it. I received this comforter today and took it out the box, Wow very thin and lightweight. I was thinking more of a fluff and thick. Not happy with it but I will keep it anyway because I like the purple/grey color. My error for not reading the description all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Vonda

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful summer comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful summer comforter. If you want a thick, fluffy comforter, this is NOT for you. It is perfect for the spring, summer and fall, the colors are great, I LOVE the gray. Highly recommend. Using this in our guest bedroom and our first guest loved it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: 2 star review because although it is very pretty and arrived in a timely manner, one of the pillow shams was missing and they wouldn't just send me one. They wanted to send me a whole new set, have me take out one sham and then return the rest of that set back. I don't see why I have to go through the hassle of doing all that when it was there mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Okay even though I sent it back I am still giving it a 5-star review because it was super soft I love the pillow covers and everything about it was great, but the yellow is a bright Sunshine yellow. A very very bright yellow. And everything in my room is a soft subtle yellow so I had to send it back. But if it was the right yellow I would have totally kept it and been so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this comforter! I searched for a long time for the perfect weight comforter but that is also soft and this is it. I will be buying a second one so I always have a backup! It washes very well. I don’t put my comforters in the dryer so I don’t know how it does. I got the purple one and the color is dead on to the listing. If you are looking for an all season comforter this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Combo!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is exactly that, comfortable! The item arrived with no tips, tears, or extra strings. It's very lightweight and does a great job of keeping you warm without getting too hot. The fabric is also very soft. Even as king size, it is very easy to wash and maintain. I also enjoy the two-tone reversible sides. The pattern looks very neat when the bed is made. It is also a good addition just to have on hand for an extra blanket. The pillow cases are also two-tone and soft to the touch. I love the fact that they zip closed so no tags show and the pillow stays in place. I would purchase this again in any size.
customer_reviews.author: JaNae Berner

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT, LIGHTWEIGHT & COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket & the color! It brightens my room. I initially want a BIG FLUFFY blanket for my new comforter. But this blanket has a decent thickness, very light & comfortable. Definitely considering buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Youtube: MidnightAndI

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Purchased for my daughter's new bed as it matched some sheets she picked out. There are loose strings/threads everywhere from the design they use throughout. A giant snag in one section that will surely develop into a hole soon. Black, crusty mark on one area, as well. Tried washing it to see if the crusty stuff would come off... it didn't. Looks cute in pic, ok in person. It is very lightweight. Wouldn't really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and as described
customer_reviews.text: I like this comforter, my only disgruntlement is because we have two WHITE haired dogs. (My personal problem not the product) For some reason I always forget that we like to family style dog pile on the bed to watch movies (kids and fur kids) and the dog hair sticks into the fabric weave so bad! Besides the pet hair problem, the blanket is great because it’s light enough for spring/summer and heavy enough to be nice when it gets really chilly. The actual blanket looks like the picture too!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Light and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I get very hot when I sleep and I prefer lighter blankets. I have been looking for a thinner but nice quality comforter for a while. This is very light, very soft, the stitching is beautiful. I love the shade of purple and the grey, it matches my other blankets, and my cat. =^.^= The shams are a little smaller than I was expecting but I think I might just have long pillows. They have zippers and are also really nice. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LadyRiv

customer_reviews.title: Nice COMFORTER, but Warranty is MEANINGLESS
customer_reviews.text: You cannot access the given website for warranty information. I sent two emails to their customer service dept, but no response. Last week I wrote to the Amazon customer service dedicated to warranties - no response. This is a nice comforter, but don't expect anyone to guarantee its warranty. Phooey!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Not for colder months
customer_reviews.text: Super soft but is lightweight and not recommended for colder months. If you found this review useful, please let Amazon and me know by clicking the helpful button below!
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsy4816

customer_reviews.title: Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap cheap. Arrived damaged. Won't let me add pictures. Not worth the price. Total cheap crap. Update: Picture added. The stitching issue as shown in the picture spans across the entire cover. The quality is a disappointment because I love the color :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was all nice, but then
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get the product, and to say it isn’t super cute would be a lie. Let me tell you how disappointed I was when I got to the shams, however. I don’t know how this one slipped through the cracks but it did and it really hurts the all over quality of the set. Disappointed, I can’t deny.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my mother-in-law and she absolutely loved it and put it on her bed that day. That, in and of itself, is a testimony to its pleasing appearance because she tends to store things away until later. I can’t attest to durability or whether it’s easy to clean because we live in different towns, but I will take the fact that she hasn’t mentioned any issues as a good sign the comforter set is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D Everson

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is cute. Don't expect it to be Ralph Lauren quality it's not.but I did wash it and dry it with no problems because it was a little wrinkled because it's vacuum packed.what for thirty bucks or so it's worth it and I wanted this color so bad to match my color scheme.. see picture
customer_reviews.author: bawstongirl

customer_reviews.title: So soft & cuddly! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is so comfy! It’s lightweight but has a nice cuddly fluff to it. The teal/gray colors are so vibrant and it hasn’t faded with washing & drying. The material has not pilled and has an amazing silky softness to it. Definitely would buy again and I would also recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cottony. Holds in the heat but is breathable enough if youre a sweater. I got 3 (one king and two twins for the bunk bed). My son is a sweaty sleeper so bad that he overheats by morning to where he gets a little barfy so these help soooooo much. Also me and my hubby are opposite sleepers (he gets sweaty and i get cold) and it pleases us both.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comforter, Pillow Cases Are Good Too
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super warm, looks good after two years of constant use and regular fluffing through the dryer. Against all recommendations, I did put it in my front loading washing machine a few times and it’s been just fine, no clumping of the stuffing! I don’t use the pillow cases often, but they’re pretty solid as travel pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Anchor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed . I got the gray and black and the color is as described ,very light weight almost like a sheet. I washed it when I recieved it because that is what you are suppose to do and it is covered in some white stuff I can't get off. so I never really got to use it. bummer
customer_reviews.author: Bargain lady

customer_reviews.title: Like a sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter's birthday. It looked beautiful in the pictures, and even when it arrived, it looked nice in the packaging. But, when she opened it up, it was like a thin, cheap sleeping bag. Not only that, but the shams are so short, they won't even fit a standard pillow. Very disappointed. The only plus is that it is true to color.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N Mandy C

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this comforter so much that when I upgraded to a bigger bed, I made sure to get the same brand in a larger size. It is the perfect combination of soft and cozy while also not being too heavy. The price point is great, especially for a college student or a first apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It has small holes all over the black side
customer_reviews.text: One side of the blanket has small pin holes that stuffing comes out of. So the black side is covered in fuzz. I had to go and stitch each tiny hole tofox it for my son who loved the blanket. Otherwise I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a teenager
customer_reviews.text: My teenager is a zen type kid. Has very little in her room but she was wanting some color. This bedspread and pillowcase is very pretty. The pillowcase zips your pillow inside. She has a firm pillow and was a bit difficult to get inside it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Not a bed in a bag but a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter who now lives the color orange. The colors are vibrant, it is comfortable and soft and met and exceeded my expectations. Great product. I stupidly didn't read the description when my husband sent me the link I thought it was a bed in a bag. It is a comforter and sham. But thankfully my daughter loved it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D'Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, pretty, and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the the value slot. That's why I shopped it to begin with. I committed to dressing six twin beds; this was one of the styles I chose. Its lightweight also. Always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: KKtheflower

customer_reviews.title: A Lightweight Comforter Built for Some
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this comforter twice now in different colors and used the first purchase for over a year. Here's the deal--this comforter is somewhat thin and lightweight. It really is designed for those who sleep hot. I'm a hot sleeper and this comforter is just divine. It's not for everyone, but for the right person this is an A+ comforter at a solid price. Also, I received my package 30 hours after I ordered it, which is nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: For our little guy. Bought a full/queen for a twin bed so that I could fold it in half and use it kind of like a sleeping bag for him (that’s what he likes and it’s super easy to make the bed). It is good quality and the yellow is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: ~~Quality Product~~
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used one of these for many years and in all honesty forgot how warm they are. Living in a log cabin, it does get chilly in here during the night. What a difference this has made on my bed. Checked it out completely when it arrived and no rips, tears or loose stitching. Washed it a couple of times and everything remains the same as when it arrived. Most highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity...

customer_reviews.title: Too delicate for our cat, but very very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this set so much. BUT...my cat, who does not have a habit of destroying things, has accidentally ruined the comforter, only 2 months after we got it. She has accidentally pulled up little pieces all over the corner she sleeps on. If you don't have an animal on your bed, I definitely recommend. If you do, this is too delicate.
customer_reviews.author: theAyKay

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Measurement Description... RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a comforter that will hang over the side of my 15" mattress. I need minimum 104" and this is the 2nd comforter I've ordered that described it being 104" and the 2nd one that actually measured at 102" I'm returning this product and really hope the next one I find has an accurate description.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Got this to downsize my comforter and did not expect too much, but it is actually really soft and light weight and works great. I'm really happy I decided to take a chance with this comforter
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Cool yet warm down comforter
customer_reviews.text: Only downfall is...if you have a pet (I have a yellow labrador) the hair gets stuck into the material. Washed it once and then brought it to the dry cleaners. The hair gets woven into it somehow? Lol Otherwise, it’s a light weight comfortor that keeps you warm but doesn’t make you feel over heated. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaShops

customer_reviews.title: we surprised her with a "princess" bed and this was the perfect comforter to complete it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's room, we surprised her with a "princess" bed and this was the perfect comforter to complete it. It is extremely soft, time will tell how it does after multiple washes, but I do plan and recommend all to hang it out to dry so it doesn't lose that softness or shape. The color was exactly as pictured, one side light peach and the other side grey.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find color
customer_reviews.text: This is the only place I was able to find a real comforter just in time for xmas! Reversible, lightweight, bit quality could have been better. Material seemed too thing for a comforter
customer_reviews.author: Mama Approved

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the twin navy/grey for my son. Its pretty soft, we like the colors. We were expecting something a little fluffier with the goose down. It washed well and is aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: The filling comes out
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and soft, but the filling started coming out after a week or so. I tried to stitch it back and it has been holding up ever since. Will wait and see how long can it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter for price
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter. Like it’s ability to be reversible. Would be cool if the reverse side could be something other than grey. But good concept. Cases have zipper. Held up in washer. Small threads peeking out at some parts of fabric. But nothing too alarming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin. Lightweight. Comes vacuum sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. A lot less fluffy than I expected. It was vacuumed sealed but didn’t fluff up much after opening. A bit wrinkled but not overly. Perfect colors. Very soft and comfy. Sleeps cozy.
customer_reviews.author: tnChick & NarcoJoe

customer_reviews.title: You receive inferior products unless you pay more!
customer_reviews.text: I received the comforter today and opened it. I put it on my bed to see if it fit and it did. The problem is it isn't very full of the inner material and I could feel my fingers where there was no fill at all. Luckily, I only need it for summer because I certainly couldn't expect this product to keep me warm in the winter. I would expect a better product for the money I spent for it. I've had many comforters and believe me this isn't good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Owensby

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorites
customer_reviews.text: It's so so soft and easy to store too. The vibrant yellow is something to see. The soft gray is very clean and neat when you want a subdued look. Love the zipper closure on the pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Non-durable material.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while now. Surprisingly warm in the winter for such light material! Definitely cheap material. Some threads are poking out at the seams already. Haven't tried washing it as I don't think it'll hold up well, but living in a desert I tend to sleep on top of blankets, so it doesn't get dirty. No static, very soft. Comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Packaging smells so horrible..like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is great overall. Lightweight but warm. My issue is the packaging came and STANK. At first like cat pee and then when I opened the box etc it smelled like CHEMICALS. I bought two so the first one I washed got the smell out but the second one HAS to be washed again. The box and packaging were all clear of stains so I don’t think anything spilled on them in the shipping process. Seriously..my WHOLE house smelled like these packages when they came. DISGUSTING.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: with time it turns into a beautiful fluffy comforter
customer_reviews.text: When you receive this you might think 'you got what you paid for' and it's a cheap thin comforter: Never fear, with time it turns into a beautiful fluffy comforter! After two weeks and one wash, it is a beautiful summer weight comforter; big, soft, and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Pretty, and Purple!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Sarah @ Comfort Spaces, I couldn't be any happier than I am with my beautiful new deep purple "soft as silk" down alternative quilt.I also bought purple sheets to match, and, OMG, my bed looks exactly like the picture. My hubby said that purple was historically the color used only for royalty, and I do feel like a queen ensconced in silky luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Alindamazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shop on!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap quality. I made more for this one over others that were less expensive and expected better quality. It is light weight, but warm. The shams are a joke...Very cheap, hate them!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match to the curtains & sheets I bought
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match to the curtains & sheets I bought.Unable to link to the curtains, they must be sold out. Very soft, nice quality comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Strohecker

customer_reviews.title: Comforter great, shams not so much!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the comforter is great! The shams, however, are shams! The opening for the pillow has been sewn on both sides, leaving only about 12” to try and stuff a pillow into.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Robin McCabe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lot smaller than I thought it was going to be, think more like a cheap hotel computer then anything luxury. But it serves its purpose on the guest bedroom bed. It’s is softer now that I washed it and used tons of fabric softener.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Great comforters!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. My girls love their colors and I was able to make a sort of color scheme even tho each girl got their own color. I bought 3 and it was so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee Is A Bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Its a mildly okay comforter set. Its nothing extraordinary, but it gets the job done. Definitely not too crazy heavy and isn't going to feel stuffy if you run a little hot (though I was intending to buy a comforter that was a bit on the thicker end). The pillow covers are about exactly what you would expect. Overall, a good purchase, but don't get your expectations through the roof. The color selection is definetly a postive though.
customer_reviews.author: Caz Rasinski

customer_reviews.title: A Brighter Day
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this comforter. I needed to brighten up a relatively small space and this was just what the space needed. It's not fluffy, but also not too flat. It's lightweight and comfortable, but warm enough for a cold night. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Monique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live for this comfort. Its light weight enough to feel as if I'm fighting between uncomfortable hot and freezing cold. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: I love the pattern
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern, and the colors look just like they do in the pictures in real life. The comforter is so soft too. I got this for my daughter and she loves it. When I first felt it I wish I had gotten it for my size bed, it is absolutely so comfy and the quality and price are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mekenna

customer_reviews.title: Great light comforter
customer_reviews.text: We love this comforter. It is light weight and soft. The color is wonderful and exactly what I was expecting. It does take a minute to warm up, but once the area under the blanket is warm, it stays warm! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is decent quality. I washed it right away and it held up fine. The shams looked like they were too small for a standard pillow but they actually fit fine but are very thin and feel very cheap. For the price however I'm not disappointed at all. I got the purple/gray and it was true to the picture as for color.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color! I ordered this to match the 'Cloud 9 Dog Print Twin 3-Pc Sheet Set' I needed for a new chair/bed in my grand kids room. It matches perfectly and is very soft and warm. I couldn't be happier and the kids love it too! Great price, and great product. Works for both boys and girls!
customer_reviews.author: jncporter

customer_reviews.title: Great dorm bedding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as his college bed set because I have the same one at my house and bought one for my dorm as well. It's both lightweight and heavy, great for all year. Super soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowerchild

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good & Feels Good
customer_reviews.text: We 've had this comforter for only a week now and I will add to my review in about 6 months when I've washed it several times. From first glance it is soft and the weight is perfect. The colors complement each other nicely and I am very happy this this set.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Love the colors.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the king is a bit small for the mattress. Other than that it is very soft and comfortable. Durable enough to wash in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Very Awesome Pillow/Comfort Combo Set.
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 1/2 yr. old Daughter loves it for her Twin Bed. The Wife also loves it. So i did very well, with this purchase. Nice bright color(s), very warm to the body, Pillow Case fits very well on exciting Pillow, came package very neatly & fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with a cheaper comforter, but it's really nice. I bought one for all three of our beds, and we all love them.
customer_reviews.author: walter stroing

customer_reviews.title: Good comforter
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice comforter. It’s held up well over the last six months. We have washed it several times. The color is great. Fits well. No wrinkle sheets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality comforter and the pillow sham had a zipper closure, I absolutely LOVED that feature. My daughter loves it and the color combo (Pink/Orange) was vivid and beautiful. It holds the color nicely after a wash and is a good, warm, comforter option.
customer_reviews.author: jessica porter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beauty 😍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my purchase and delivery was quick! The colors are as shown (pink/orange). It's light and airy but keeps me warm. I'm not fond of heavy comforters, so this is perfect! I also love the geometrical sewing pattern, which makes this comforter stand out above the rest! Thank you so much Comfort Spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new comforter, and as I tend to be more than a little picky about them, I was having a tough time of it. But than I just literally happened to stumble across the Comfort Spaces comforter. I lucked out! There is a lot I like about it. Very nice colors and pattern, it definitely adds visually to my sleep space. It is very comfortable, an absolute must. It is actually rather thin for a comforter, I was a it worried when first opening it. But my worries proved false as I began using it as it has proven warm to the point it's my only blanket. All in all, a very satisfying purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is super comfy and warm. I have this in my guest bedroom and it's great. I love how easy it was to wash because some bedding can get clumpy and gross when you wash it in the washer and dryer but it came out looking like it did in the package. Great buy. The yellow is a little brighter than I thought but still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Customer SAM

customer_reviews.title: Breathable
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. Perfect size and it’s fairly light and breathable, which is exactly how I like my comforters.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don’t wash it.
customer_reviews.text: After the first wash it clumped up in certain areas on the blanket. It will not lay flat any more. It looks like something is under the blanket but there is not. It Should not do this after first wash. Very disappointed. Can not return missed window by a week.
customer_reviews.author: TERRIE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comforter and sham at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty lightweight, but warm quilt/comforter and matching sham. I bought this to use with a twin size loveseat bed & it is perfect, it added the polished touch that I wanted, when I make up the bed for guests. The color selection was wonderful & the price was great. It washes beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: MJF Frequent Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: BEST purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: By far my hubby and I's fave comforter ever! It's so soft and durable yet it's light weight. BEST purchase I've ever made. Ordering another one (dif colors) for my guest room ♡
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Santa gave this to my granddaughter off her Christmas list and she was thrilled to get it. It's a permanent fixture on her bed now.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Feels like little soft pillows
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's so soft and comfortable. I use it for summer it can still be a little too warm for the really hot nights (I live in Utah) but you can even use it as a couch blanket. I'm not sure if it's heavy enough for winter yet, but it gets pretty cold here.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Made my picky son happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the fabric and he is very picky. Haven’t washed it yet, but it’s the type of fabric that doesn’t look like it will bleed at all. It is not heavy, but it’s a perfect weight when you live in the south.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen Mother

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: It’s says 2 piece comforter, I was expecting a bed cover and the comforter or pillow cases but it only came with the comforter so what’s the second piece because I didn’t get it
customer_reviews.author: Michella Jonathan Newell

customer_reviews.title: Color is not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Color is NOT what is shown. I was expecting the bluish color as in the picture to match the bedroom I have, instead I get a green color shipped to me that is the ugliest color ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter, came fast. Came in a vacuum seal. It's already been through one wash and dry cycle, no tears or rips. My only dislike was that it was a bit wrinkly so I put it in the dryer for the second time with the "wrinkle guard" setting on and it didn't have as many wrinkles as before.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, super soft, and warm!! I live in VT and it's warm enough for me to use with just a sheet in the winter and I'm sure I'll be comfortable with using it in the summer as well with the use of an a/c. Great price as well! And love the color! Matches my sheets I bought too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sheldrick

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good, soft, lightweight comforter that is also surprisingly warm for how light it is. Perfect for those "mild" winter months (and it's even better when you pair it with a bed warmer). Only issue is that even when I dry it on the low-heat/delicate cycle, it still clumps a little and I have to beat it back into submission.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as part of a Christmas gift. It’s the exact color as ordered and very soft. Not sure I’d buy it again for myself, but I think it’s good enough for a kid. It’s not too thick or thin in my opinion and doesn’t make her sweat while sleeping. So I’d recommend it for a kid’s bedroom
customer_reviews.author: calena

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to colors!!
customer_reviews.text: I should've paid attention to the color title more bc this the coral is more of an orange but that is my mistake! Overall this is very lightweight, I washed it immediately and (after following directions) it turned out okay! I am decently happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alexanna

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The stuffing was pulling apart inside the comforter and after washing it went to hell. Bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight perfect for summer and fall I thought other blankets. I ordered full size and it’s a true fit. I have the black and light gray on the other size. Very pleased with the packaging delivery and pricing. Will order again in the future
customer_reviews.author: lynnmcirish

product_meta.title: Comfort Spaces Vixie Comforter Set All Season Reversible Goose Down Alternative Stitched Geometrical Pattern Bedding, Full/Queen, Coral/Grey 3 Piece
feature_bullets: Design - Embrace this fun and modern geometric cloud pattern. Coral and grey contrasting color design
Feature - reversible turn the comforter on either side for the contrasting color of your choice, perfect for a college dorm or as an update to your home bedroom
Material - premium microfiber fabric that is highly breathablility ans insulation offers a delicate touch to your skin, that is naturally wrinkle and shrinkage resistant
Set includes: 1 comforter: 90"W x 90"L, 2 standard shams: 20"W x 26"L
Easy care - to fluff: tumble dry on low heat for 15-20 minutes. To clean: machine wash cold on gentle cycle, tumble dry on low heat, do not bleach bedding sets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,739 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
